KOUSA: To our friends returning from the expedition to the stormy planet: I hope you have been well!
2
1
KOUSA: Since your last expedition, I have pondered hard for a way to offer you protection from the terrible storms you have faced on your journey..
3
2
KOUSA: To that end, we have engineered a new invention in collaboration with our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City:</color> the storm shelter!
4
3
KOUSA: The storm shelter is a device that generates a gravity field designed to hold Nomai in place, perfect for protecting Nomai in zero-gravity.
5 3
KOUSA: Thanks to the <color=orange>Sunless City's</color> contributions, the device is able to autonomously power itself when islands are launched into orbit, and even deactivates on its own afterwards to conserve power.
6 5
KOUSA: I humbly invite you to visit my workshop on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow's</color> surface soon, so that I may share this invention with you and send it with you on your next expedition!
7 6
PLUME: How incredible, Kousa! I must thank our friends from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> when we next set off for our expedition together.
8 7
PLUME: And of course, you have my deepest gratitude for your hard work, Kousa. I look forward to visiting the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> to learn more about the storm shelters soon!
